review: I've used my Fire TV for a couple months now. All in all it's a good device.The recent addition of ads on the menu screen is rather annoying though. I'm not a fan of purchasing a product at a premium price, only to be shown ads.Hopefully Amazon realizes the error of their ways, but I won't hold my breath.

review: Set up was easy, everything worked properly the first time. Speech recognition is excellent. Search is a bit slow but I search online at Amazon.com occasionally and find things to put on the watchlist  while I watch something more entertaining on Fire TV at the same time.

review: Amazon Fire works great with cable TV,  but if you have satelite internet be sure to watch usage per month because movies will use up several GB's per movie. Netflix makes It possible for you to receive unmetered usage between the hours of 12:00 AM to 5:00 AM. I am not certain about Amazon Fire, but I would like to hear some feedback concerning this.
